snippet: A cloud of scandal has spread from the Republican incumbent Bob McDonnell to his would-be successor. Now a potential scandal threatens to distract the Democratic candidate’s campaign.
abstract: Potential scandal threatens to distract Virginia gubernatorial campaign of Democratic candidate Terry McAuliffe, as GreenTech Automotive, electric car company he founded, is target of investigation by Securities and Exchange Commission; for months, Virginia governor’s race has unfolded beneath cloud of scandal over Republican incumbent Bob McDonnell that spread to his would-be Republican successor Kenneth T Cuccinelli II.
lead_paragraph: A cloud of scandal has spread from the Republican incumbent Bob McDonnell to his would-be successor. Now a potential scandal threatens to distract the Democratic candidate’s campaign.

headline.main: Clouds Spread to Democratic Side of Virginia Governor’s Race
headline.print_headline: Clouds Spread to Democratic Side of Virginia Governor’s Race
